Player History
Released by Halifax on 4/7/1980...
Signed as a free agent by Penn on 2/15/1981 to a 1-year deal worth $450,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/8/1981, off Scott Jean (PIL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/2/1981, off Benny Maxim (CI)...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/9/1987 with a Fractured Wrist, out for 5 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 2/7/1988 to a 3-year deal worth $1,250,000 per year...
Injured on 5/9/1991 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for one week...
